title: Working Student - Sales Support
content:
We are looking for a bright and enthusiastic individual to join our award-winning Düsseldorf team as a Working Student - Sales Support. We're looking for someone who's driven, enthusiastic and hungry to sell.
Responsibilities

Assist sales teams with internal processes to maximize productivity and efficiency of the team’s external responsibilities and help increase overall revenue for Teads.
Internal interdisciplinary coordination of requests and briefs across all of Teads revenue relevant business functions including Client Services, Teads Studio, Insight, Data, Enterprise and Sales
Coordinate and help prepare client offers with minor assistance of the sales team
Learn how to operate our CRM, input data and process client orders for Sales and Client Services
Constantly build knowledge of Teads products, technology and their USPs within the overall online advertising world

Qualifications & Skills 

You are passionate about the world of online advertising
Currently studying (Bachelor or Master degree) and you are looking for a position for atleast 12 months or longer
You are organized and autonomous and have great relationship skills
 Experience with PowerPoint, Excel, Word or Google Suite (GMail, Sheets, Docs, Slides etc).
First knowledge of traditional as well as contemporary/online marketing tactics and strategies.
Effective team player with strong customer service, communication, presentation and creative problem-solving skills.
Fluent in German and English

About Teads
 
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.
 
As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
 
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
 
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
 
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
